document.full_text: josh tomlin outpitched boston's josh beckett, cleveland came up with just enough timely hits and the indians kept the visiting red sox winless this season with a 3-1 victory tuesday night.
document.title: roundup: red sox and rays are still searching for their first win
lines_and_colors: josh tomlin outpitched boston's josh beckett, cleveland came up with just enough timely hits and the indians kept the visiting red sox winless this season with a 3-1 victory tuesday night.
